https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zzaJOBj4JgEEHrQzyGtnTidRHfe.jpg A dodo, a bird that disappeared 3000 years ago, makes its appearance in Athens in the luxurious residence of a family on the verge of ruin for which the countdown has begun: the 38 crucial and saving hours that separate them from the marriage of their daughter with a rich heir. The boundaries between reason and madness will be tested and the situation will soon be out of control. Dodo
